products.title: Konya Blackout Butter Cream
products.description: Konya blackout butter cream plain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade.

products.title: Screenview Black/black Roller Blind
products.description: Their screenview roller blinds, are a set of flame-retardant, dimout screen fabrics, made from a pvc/polyester fabric which are perfect for temperature control in offices and hot rooms. This black roller blind is perfect for blocking out the heat and harmful uv rays from your room, keeping the core room temperature down, a must for any modern environment. These magic screen blinds ensure you can still see outside but don't let anybody outside see in.

products.title: Carnival 15 Ochre Roller Blind
products.description: Carnival roller blinds are great for kitchens, bathrooms or offices. A versatile fabric, carnival 15 fabrics are moisture-resistant, flame-retardant and anti-allergen coated, and is available in several fabulous, saturated colours. This sunshine yellow electric roller adds a bright splash of colour to your window, evoking feelings of positivity and warm summer days. At swiftdirectblinds, quality is important to us, so not only does this roller blind made by their expert team and comes with customer-first service, we also provide a five-year guarantee, for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Metz Pvc Blackout Stone Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The metz pvc blackout patterned range, changes colour shades when light hits it, and offers a wide array of colours to choose from. Waterproof and flame retardant, metz fabrics are durable and practical. This light-grey, marbled, stone grey blackout roller blind is also great at blocking out light, so is a great option for rooms where screens feature, such as living rooms or offices, and due to it's waterproof fabric, is also a smart option for bathrooms or kitchens.
